t: Trust in the Name of the Lord Our God
To the choirmaster. A Psalm of David.
May*pn the Lord*s answer you in the day of trouble! May*ld the name of the God of Jacob protect you!
May*ln he send you help from the sanctuary and*ld give you support from Zion!
May*ln he remember all your offerings and*ld regard with favor your burnt sacrifices! Selah*ig
May*pn he grant you your heartâ€™s desire and*ld fulfill all your plans!
May*ln we shout for joy over your salvation, and*ld in the name of our God set up our banners! May*ln the Lord*s fulfill all your petitions!
Now*pn I know that the Lord*s saves his anointed; he*ld will answer him from his holy heaven with*ld the saving might of his right hand.
Some*ln trust in chariots and some in horses, but*ld we trust in the name of the Lord*s our God.
They*ln collapse and fall, but*ld we rise and stand upright.
O*pn Lord,*s save the king! May*ld he answer us when we call.
